principles: Strict monotone palette (Black & White) with one vibrant accent
Line-oriented forms (borders instead of filled surfaces)

button.primary: bg-black text-white hover:bg-neutral-800 transition-colors h-14 px-8 text-lg font-bold border-2 border-black rounded-none
button.secondary: bg-white text-black hover:bg-neutral-100 transition-colors h-14 px-8 text-lg font-bold border-2 border-black rounded-none
button.ghost: bg-transparent text-black hover:bg-neutral-100 transition-colors h-14 px-8 text-lg font-bold border-2 border-transparent hover:border-black rounded-none
button.icon: h-14 w-14 flex items-center justify-center border-2 border-transparent hover:border-black hover:bg-neutral-100 transition-colors rounded-none

input.default: w-full bg-transparent border-0 border-b-2 border-black py-4 px-2 text-lg text-black placeholder:text-neutral-500 focus:outline-none focus:border-b-[3px] focus:bg-[var(--tekton-bg-brand-default)]/10 transition-all rounded-none

badge.default: inline-flex items-center bg-black text-white px-3 py-1 text-sm font-bold rounded-none
badge.secondary: inline-flex items-center bg-white border-2 border-black px-3 py-1 text-sm font-bold text-black rounded-none
badge.brand: inline-flex items-center bg-[var(--tekton-bg-brand-default)] text-black px-3 py-1 text-sm font-bold border-2 border-black rounded-none

table.head: py-4 px-4 text-base font-bold text-black uppercase tracking-wider

typography.caption: text-sm font-bold text-neutral-500 uppercase tracking-widest

avatar.default: relative flex h-10 w-10 shrink-0 overflow-hidden rounded-none

progress.default: relative h-4 w-full overflow-hidden rounded-none bg-secondary

slider.default: relative flex w-full touch-none select-none items-center

slider.thumb: block h-5 w-5 rounded-none border-2 border-black bg-background ring-offset-background transition-colors focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-ring focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:pointer-events-none disabled:opacity-50

form.label: text-sm font-medium leading-none peer-disabled:cursor-not-allowed peer-disabled:opacity-70 uppercase tracking-widest font-bold

label.default: text-sm font-medium leading-none peer-disabled:cursor-not-allowed peer-disabled:opacity-70 uppercase tracking-wider font-bold

sidebar.default: flex h-full w-64 flex-col overflow-y-auto bg-background border-2 border-black pb-4

navigation-menu.trigger: group inline-flex h-10 w-max items-center justify-center rounded-none bg-background px-4 py-2 text-sm font-medium transition-colors hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground focus:bg-accent focus:text-accent-foreground focus:outline-none disabled:pointer-events-none disabled:opacity-50

breadcrumb.list: flex flex-wrap items-center gap-1.5 break-words text-sm text-muted-foreground sm:gap-2.5

command.input: flex h-11 w-full rounded-none bg-transparent py-3 text-sm outline-none placeholder:text-muted-foreground disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50
